title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit! This electronic learning kit is perfect for children aged 8 and up, and is designed for students in grades 3-6. It has received the prestigious Parents' Choice Silver Award, making it a top choice for educational toys.

With this science kit, your child will have the opportunity to conduct 25 guided experiments that explore the fascinating world of motors, generators, magnetic fields, and electric currents. They will gain a deeper understanding of how electricity and magnetism work together through hands-on learning.

The kit includes a comprehensive 48-page color student guide, providing step-by-step instructions and explanations for each experiment. The full-color manual, published in 2012 and spanning 60 pages, further enhances the learning experience. It covers topics such as electric motor operation, hand-crank electric generator configuration, and the exploration of magnetic fields and electric current.

The kit features an electric motor made of transparent plastic, allowing children to observe its inner workings. The motor can be operated using batteries, providing a practical demonstration of how electricity powers motion. It can also be reconfigured into a hand-crank electric generator, showcasing the conversion of motion into electricity.

The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is not only educational but also engaging and fun. It encourages children to actively participate in experiments and explore the concepts of energy conversion, magnetic fields, and circuits. By engaging in activities such as experimenting with magnets, building simple circuits, and learning about gears and drive-trains, children develop a deeper understanding of STEM concepts.

The dimensions of the science kit are 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth. It weighs approximately 1.3 pounds, making it portable and easy to carry.

This science kit is a perfect gift for young aspiring scientists and engineers. It provides an engaging and educational experience that fosters a love for STEM subjects. With the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit, your child will have a blast while learning important scientific principles.

Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit, a comprehensive learning tool for young minds. This electronic learning kit is designed to provide an engaging and educational experience for children aged 8 and above.

With 25 guided experiments, this kit offers a wide range of hands-on activities that explore the fascinating world of motors and generators. The included student guide, spanning 48 colorful pages, provides step-by-step instructions to ensure a smooth learning process.

Ideal for students in grades 3-6, this science kit has been recognized with the prestigious Parents' Choice Silver Award. The full-color manual, published in 2012 and spanning 60 pages, goes into greater detail and enhances the learning experience.

Featuring an electric motor made of transparent plastic, this kit allows children to witness the inner workings of a motor and understand how it converts electricity into motion. The motor can be powered by batteries or hand-cranked to simulate an electric generator, enabling children to explore the conversion of motion into electricity.

Through the exploration of magnetic fields and electric current, children will gain a deeper understanding of these fundamental concepts. This kit encourages critical thinking and problem-solving skills while fostering a love for science and technology.

The dimensions of this science kit are 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth, with a weight of 1.3 pounds. Its compact size makes it easily portable, allowing for learning opportunities both at home and in the classroom.

Embrace the world of STEM with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit. Unlock the potential of your child's mind and ignite their curiosity in the fields of electricity, magnetism, and energy conversion.
